content:
Hello,
I have a general question about how to enable mobile push notification on Zulip.
I am using Zulip docker container image and I have uncommented the following line on docker-compose.yml.

  # Uncomment this when configuring the mobile push notifications service
  SETTING_PUSH_NOTIFICATION_BOUNCER_URL: 'https://push.zulipchat.com'

However, it seems to me that the push notification is not working on the mobile device.
I was wondering if I miss anything.
Thank you so much for taking the time to read my message. :)

Alex Vandiver said:

Have you read https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/stable/production/mobile-push-notifications.html ?

Hi Alex,
Thank you so much for the article. That really helps. It wasn't working before I had not registered my server.
Everything works after I register my server. :)
